channel.title: Project Majestic! ~Revolutionize Runescape Forever~
channel.description:
[center][u][b]Project Majestic[/b][/u][/center]
[center] We are a unique RSPS, that stride for perfection. By the time we are done we will have most (IF not all of the following features. And plenty more!)[/center]
[center]Construction Grand Exchange Mini-Games (Custom to make our server stand out) Awesome Clan Chat (Recruiting) All working spell's in spellbook Dupes Fixed Dueling Arena Banking Bank Tabs (Possibly) Custom Maps Custom Skilling Area Bosses 100% Fighting 100% all skills No Lag Perfect switching Perfect clan wars Help desk More ranks Donation Tab (For whom that donate :)) Unique Home Friendly Staff New Currency More in the Teleport Tab Plenty more will add more later! [/center]
[center]Update Log! (Updated daily) [/center] [code]- Changed for stalls to give items instead of coins - Removed account name and pass saving (loading thru mysql) - Fixed npc respawning glitch (Note: Never use NPC object in NPCHandler) - Renamed sendFrame36 > setConfig - Added banking swapping/inserting - Fixed running up to npc and instantly attacking - Same fix for players (mainly fixes the combat follow) - Dragon spear spec fixed for players and npcs (including clipping it) - Woodcutting: Added proper chances based on axe type + level and added black axe - Pickaxe: Added proper chances based on pickaxe type + level - Fishing: Added proper chances based on level - Npcs can't walk thru players or other npcs - Npc's random walking is now clipped - Player's cant fight thru walls/objects - Fixed special attacks
- Npc's cant fight thru walls/objects - Disabled commands in wildy, pits, duelling, and cwars - You don't earn any xp off fighting barricades anymore - Weapon doesn't unequip if returning flag from your base - Relogging in cwars will let you continue to play if its ur game - Barricades can be attacked again - Character running option now saved on relog - Fixed maging/ranging from cwars walls - Prevented opening doors from top of walls - Added redemption prayer - Added retribution prayer - Temporarly removed tutorial
- Switching gear (hybrid) replaces the equipment in inventory and much faster now - Fixed bank swap/insert options (undupable) - Harvesting skills (such as woodcutting) now have almost perfect chances - Completely redid the accuracy formula, works almost exactly like in 474 runescape (pvp and pvn) - Tweaked the combat skill training, formula's now 100% like rs, except multiplied - If you try to use spec but don't have enough energy, attack will not reset (you will just hit normally) - Some server stability flaws have been fixed - Getting a random event is now set to 5% chance every 10 minutes - Chickens cannot kill you (noob-friendly + like real rs) - Game interfaces update properly - Random events will not appear while your in a minigame - Promoted cc members cannot kick owner anymore - Thieving prints correct message now, and tomato is edible... - NPC's now correctly follow you (walk back home if more than 10 spaces from home) - Smelting base added - Revamped npc drop system, updates the drops for each npc - Finished prayer system, every prayer now works 100% - Added a skill timer to prevent mass clicking - Added barrows; TODO: add doors/puzzles - Fixed nulled objects in client (No more freezing in varrock) - Fixed auto retaliate + player blocking
- Fixed reseting the animation while skilling - Players stop attacking when their target is dead - Fixed maging npcs follow bug - Removed teleports from modern+ancients+lunar spellbook - left only spells that work - Crumble undead can only be used on undead npc now - Fixed enchanting items - Adjusted some weapon and skill timers - Pheasants dont give xp anymore - Redid clan chat - TODO: Clan saving (after server restarts) - Cant tb npcs, fixed autocast for crumble undead (every modern and lunar spell now working 100%) - Npc's walking home is clipped - Npcs and players who are frozen cannot be re-entangled - Added clan saving - Fixed gaining magic xp - Fixed lighting fire from ground event - Fixed retribution (multi and single zones work properly now) - Fixed server crash when player x-logs on death - Fixed unlimited runes with proper staff glitch - Major work on new resizable client, clan chat works properly now - Added lunar spell "spellbook swap" - Added lunar spell "dream" - Fixed up superheat spell - Added ability to cast another spell while autocasting - Every spell in all 3 magic books work properly now - Added minigame teleporter at home - Added barrows repair guy at barrow hills - Added slayer skill (Duradel located at home) - Adjusted thieving prices - Added minigame teleporter at home
- Added barrows repair guy at barrow hills
- Added slayer skill (Duradel located at home)
- Adjusted thieving prices
- Fixed items being glitched when dropped on heightlevel above 0
- Slayer tower now fully functional
- Picking food/objects now have lvl reqs (farming) and give farming xp
- Added all the infinity rune staffs - Added lootshare for clans: Items over 5k is randomly decided between members in area, items over 100k get sold and split cash between members (10 squares) - Finished teleport tab - Fixed teleport timers - Fixed calculator when damaging a player with melee (to determine killer) - When trading or challenging a player, you will first run up to them and then send the request - Added an item check for every packet (to prevent even the minor dupes) - Fixed up lootshare (5k+ items get shared in a 20square radius), removed coinshare for now - Added player following npc (when npc walks) - Added men/women in Canifis that transform into werewolfs - Added a proper ladder system - Prayer altar in Lletya now boosts prayer by 2 and is the only altar that bones can be used on - Added foods to use on a baked potato in Lletya shop - Fixed buying items from shop - Added planting flowers - Custom objects now clipped (by coords atm) - Added proper attack animations for most weapons (missing spear emote) - Added restore potions and fixed super restores - Added height definiton for ground items - Fixed dharok's greataxe interface - Fixed arrow checking while ranging - Deaths only add if a player kills you in multi
- Added giant rats at home, increased hp of chicken - Changed rate of getting boss item drops - Fixed requirements for dragonhide armor - Added distance check for item on object packet - Added drops for random event npcs - Fixed capes equipping to correct slot - Fixed farming speed - Fixed Karil's and Ahrim's attacks - Changed barrows reward rate to 10% - Increased xp rate by 1.5x (Combat now 30x and Skills 8x) - Added fishing potions - Created a new method for npc attack and defense system - Replaced item prices/worth. If you find an item that is worth the wrong amount, pm me. - Added tutorial island
- Added task level to slayer skill - Switched wilderness back to normal area - Added safe pk (Effects kdr) - Fixed slayer tasks for bandits and werewolves; added mummies - Increased npc respawn time - Fixed dc when attacking players sometimes - Castle wars now requires 3 ppl on each team to start a game - Added elf warriors at lletya - Added crafting gold bars into gold items (use on cut gems) - Fixed a couple packet bugs (following players/npcs doesnt glitch) - Fixed a bug that was causing server to crash (reload items) - Fixed cooking timer - Added a mass-clicking prevention system
- Increased price of farm products (cabbage, potato, wheat, ect..) - Fixed 2 dupes - Decreased drop rate of boss key (Now at 3% and decreases) - Fixed item bonuses on gloves and Torag platebody - Fixed mithril smelting - Fixed enchanting items - Fixed the prayer abuse bug - Fixed castle wars stairs (unglitchable) - Fixed attack distance for players - Editted npc stats to combat * 50 - Added mage bank lever and webs - Removed challange option while in a duel - Fixed walkable interfaces (wildy, duel, ect..) - Added spellbook change guy - Fixed spellbook swap spell + cast on lunar spells - Added ring of wealth effect (increased drop rate by 10%) - Fixed following during pvp - Added ancient staff drop to infernal mages - Fixed heal other and heal group spells - Adjusted npc stats once again - Added automatic double xp activator on weekends - Disabled skulling in safe pvp - Combat now resets when removing/equiping gear - Diagonal combat disabled - Disabling autocast now resets combat - Rewrote accuracy formula's - Magic splashing works correctly now - Adjusted mage npcs combat - Fixed special attack formula
- Added tzhaar cave npcs and shops - Added bolt tip making by using chisel on a cut gem - Added combining bolt tips with metal bolts - Fixed obby shield equipping to correct slot - Fixed ghostly robe (bottom) equipping to correct slot - Fixed thieving npc bug - Leveling up now resets your attack - Added mage arena minigame - Added god spells effects - Fixed change regions problem - Fixed map not loading bug when teleporting - Increased drop rates - Editted some npcs to have same drops as in rs - Your hit damage is now calculated on start of attack (prevents switching items for better bonus, ect..) - Fixed dbaxe, dspear, and rune throwaxe spec - Added d2h, seercull, daxe, darklight, and excalibur special attack (All spec weps now work) - Added proper range attack for Kalph Queen - Fixed gmaul spec delay - Protection prayers now quadruple your defence when fighting against npcs - Npc stats updated to be maxhit * 10 - Fixed "make x" option for fletching, smithing, and cooking
- Added new skilling system (1 settable event for all skills) - Changed protection prayers system to increase defence by 400 (against npc) - Added green dragons (by castle lvl 14 wildy) and king black dragon (original spot) - Fixed weapon interface update when switching weapons - Added facing npc when specing - Added different kinds of trees at home (Miscellenia) - Added skillcapes - Adjusted prayer drain rate to match rs - Fixed region system from crashing - Added dfs charge saving - Updated combat following to allow rangable objects - No more falling behind when attacking someone running - Prevented attacking with melee through fences/other rangable objects - Adjusted cooking rate - Added "buy skillcape" option to slayer master - Fixed requirements for correct bows/arrows and cbows/bolts - Npcs wander off if they can't attack you after a certain amount of time
- Tele random event will now switch your tabs to prevent botting - Fixed trading/stacking items (can't stake/trade if not enough room) - Converted range data to string base - Added all range weps proper str, proj, gfx, ect.. - Added Surgeon Tafani in duel arena (hitpoints cape) - Removed un-needed static initializers from Server class - Fixed npc walking and facing (saves correctly) - Fixed losing items when stacking on dc bug - Fixed incorrect hit delay on first attack - Fixed distance updating when out of range wep - Player hits are now handled on a cycle - Players no longer gain any xp when in a random event - Cleaned out more process from Client class - Updated ranged max hit formula - Updated melee weapons special bonus - Fixed stackable equipment going to right place when equipping 2-handed weapons - Fixed buying hp cape from surgeon tafani
- Fixed staffs to give infinite runes properly - Fixed block animations for players and npcs - Fixed duel staking bug - Fixed crafting d'hide bug - Fixed slayer tasks bug - Fixed msb spec against npcs - Npcs will no longer start their attack anim if they are dead - Muted players can no longer use yell or shout - Set npc hits on a task cycle - Increased effects of protection prayers against npcs - Fixed challange option - Fixed the map glitch when teleporting while fighting an npc - Fixed npc multi attacks (normal speed rates now) - Set correct requirements for metal c'bows - Fixed smithing messages - Removed double xp weekend and set normal xp rates at double (Combat = 50x, Skilling = 15x)
- Added anti-fire potion effects - Adjusted dragonfire to work same as rs - Added duration to fires based on log type - Fishing bait is only now used when you catch a fish - Random events added to skills (wc, fish, mine) individually - Npcs will no longer switch attack targets periodically (unless its a multi-attacker) - Fixed stun spell rune requirements - Adjusted some item prices (undead cow ribs, silk) - Fixed low and high alch spell rune requirements - Running away from random events now makes them disappear - Fixed typo in fletching (chaps and vambs switched around) - Added perfect formula for restoring/draining run energy - Fixed dfs charge saving correctly - Added anti-stuck method - Fixed clicking objects - Fixed crafting + added needle breaking
- Added Grand Exchange - Noted and unnoted items go into same shop now - Fixed the blinking dialogue bug - Made tokkul unsellable/untradable - Changed intial skilling success rate from 20% to 30% (fishing, wcing, and mining) - Agility courses now give bonus xp when you complete the whole course - Converted runecraft to use enums, fixed multiplier bug - Fixed dragonfire breath (mage protect absorbs damage, antidragon shield more effective) - Fixed so Guthan only heals when he hits you - Fixed some null pointers and added an anti-crasher - Fixed GE bug that caused an item to be sold out when only 1 of it was purchased - Prevented alching unsellable items - PVP ORIENTATION UPDATE
- Added Godwars - Ring of wealth now adds 2% chance to the total drop rate (so if drop rate is 1%, itll be 3%) - Added "enter amount" for using bones on altar - Fixed the "you are already logged in" bug - Protection prayers now give full immunity against npcs (npcs like verac still have their effect tho) - Double Everything event over, xp and drop rates restored to normal - Numerous bug fixes (if your bug still isnt fixed, post in bug section) - Added range attacks for Mutant tarn and Jungle demon
- Fixed the disconnecting on death bug - Fixed some more gwd bugs - Fixed forcewalk glitching - Fixed following player bug - Fixed freezing players bug - Added barrow gloves to barrows rewards - Fixed combat clipping abit (checks if both players are clipped before attacking) - Fixed pvp autocasting - Fixed negetive defence glitching - Added prayer bonus to trimmed skillcapes - Fixed protect item prayer and added 1.5 sec delay when activating (same as rs)
- Retribution is now set on the same timer as rs (not instantly after you die) - Added hardleather body crafting - Fixed smithing requirements - Added stud on leather making - Studs sold in alkharid craft shop - Added master farmer in lletya - sells team capes + farming cape - Added rune axe to wc shop - Fixed a shop bug - Made bandits thievable - Added poisoning npcs - Fixed hitmasks (poison will now always be green, fire will be orange) - Steelwill hits now count as magic - Fixed Karil's c'bow speed - Grand Exchange bug fixed (the one where you couldn't see ur items) - Updated red chinchompa's and multi-spells (hits npcs and players now when in multi) - Freezing spells now take effect when the spell actually hits - Added goat horn dust in herblore shop (make combat pots) - Added working combat potion - Added weapon poison in potion shop, poison+ dropped by jungle spiders and poison scorps - Fixed normal and super potion forumla's for increasing stats - Fixed normal chinchompa
- Fixed freaky forester rewards - Made dspear 2-handed - Fixed running up to npcs when using long distance weapons - Set general store "refresh rate" to 5 minutes - Fixed using aid spells on players (you run up and then cast spell) - Can't sell store items in GE for more than their store value - Added back losing items on death to any entity (player or npc) - Untradable items now go to your bank when you die (dont count as one of the items u keep) - Fixed dismantling godsword when less than 1 inven space - Fixed high alch and low alch prices - Fixed npcs from walking ontop of eachother - Added zammy spear spec - Fixed multiple bugs - Fixed 1-hit k0ing npcs drop
- Can't trade npcs thru walls - Can't trade/challenge players thru walls - Can't telegrab thru walls - Added ::yell command (Has bugs) (10/30/2011) [/code]
[center]And now for pictures![/center]
[center][img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/1218/111030185356.png[/img]
[img]http://img233.imageshack.us/img233/7187/111030185814.png[/img]
[center]Awesome Clan Chat![/center]
[img]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/5039/111030185841.png[/img]
Clan Owner Controls
[img]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/7752/111030185850.png[/img]
[img]http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/5867/111030185901.png[/img]
[img]http://img253.imageshack.us/img253/1249/111030190206.png[/img]
[img]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/3070/111030190312.png[/img]
[img]http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/9559/111030190339.png[/img]
[img]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/9334/111030190431.png[/img]
[img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/9778/111030190531.png[/img]
[img]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/7911/111030190617.png[/img]
[img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/8052/111030190724.png[/img]
[img]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/6799/111030191615.png[/img]
[img]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/8536/111030191622.png[/img]
[img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/8270/111030191630.png[/img]
More pics soon!
[u][b]Credits[/b][/u]
Kozs (Me) Baddy351 Clscaws And the others who helped contribute to the server
[/center]

@imsuperman05 wrote:

Not stable at all with tons of memory leaks!! People love memory!

item.title: Project Majestic! ~Revolutionize Runescape Forever~
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[center]Project Majestic[/center]

[center] We are a unique RSPS, that stride for perfection. By the time we are done we will have most (IF not all of the following features. And plenty more!)[/center]

[center]Construction
Grand Exchange
Mini-Games (Custom to make our server stand out)
Awesome Clan Chat (Recruiting)
All working spell’s in spellbook
Dupes Fixed
Dueling Arena
Banking
Bank Tabs (Possibly)
Custom Maps
Custom Skilling Area
Bosses
100% Fighting
100% all skills
No Lag
Perfect switching
Perfect clan wars
Help desk
More ranks
Donation Tab (For whom that donate :))
Unique Home
Friendly Staff
New Currency
More in the Teleport Tab
Plenty more will add more later! [/center]

[center]Update Log! (Updated daily) [/center]

[code]- Changed for stalls to give items instead of coins

  • Removed account name and pass saving (loading thru mysql)

  • Fixed npc respawning glitch (Note: Never use NPC object in NPCHandler)

  • Renamed sendFrame36 > setConfig

  • Added banking swapping/inserting

  • Fixed running up to npc and instantly attacking

  • Same fix for players (mainly fixes the combat follow)

  • Dragon spear spec fixed for players and npcs (including clipping it)

  • Woodcutting: Added proper chances based on axe type + level and added black axe

  • Pickaxe: Added proper chances based on pickaxe type + level

  • Fishing: Added proper chances based on level

  • Npcs can’t walk thru players or other npcs

  • Npc’s random walking is now clipped

  • Player’s cant fight thru walls/objects

  • Fixed special attacks

  • Npc’s cant fight thru walls/objects

  • Disabled commands in wildy, pits, duelling, and cwars

  • You don’t earn any xp off fighting barricades anymore

  • Weapon doesn’t unequip if returning flag from your base

  • Relogging in cwars will let you continue to play if its ur game

  • Barricades can be attacked again

  • Character running option now saved on relog

  • Fixed maging/ranging from cwars walls

  • Prevented opening doors from top of walls

  • Added redemption prayer

  • Added retribution prayer

  • Temporarly removed tutorial

  • Switching gear (hybrid) replaces the equipment in inventory and much faster now

  • Fixed bank swap/insert options (undupable)

  • Harvesting skills (such as woodcutting) now have almost perfect chances

  • Completely redid the accuracy formula, works almost exactly like in 474 runescape (pvp and pvn)

  • Tweaked the combat skill training, formula’s now 100% like rs, except multiplied

  • If you try to use spec but don’t have enough energy, attack will not reset (you will just hit normally)

  • Some server stability flaws have been fixed

  • Getting a random event is now set to 5% chance every 10 minutes

  • Chickens cannot kill you (noob-friendly + like real rs)

  • Game interfaces update properly

  • Random events will not appear while your in a minigame

  • Promoted cc members cannot kick owner anymore

  • Thieving prints correct message now, and tomato is edible…

  • NPC’s now correctly follow you (walk back home if more than 10 spaces from home)

  • Smelting base added

  • Revamped npc drop system, updates the drops for each npc

  • Finished prayer system, every prayer now works 100%

  • Added a skill timer to prevent mass clicking

  • Added barrows; TODO: add doors/puzzles

  • Fixed nulled objects in client (No more freezing in varrock)

  • Fixed auto retaliate + player blocking

  • Fixed reseting the animation while skilling

  • Players stop attacking when their target is dead

  • Fixed maging npcs follow bug

  • Removed teleports from modern+ancients+lunar spellbook - left only spells that work

  • Crumble undead can only be used on undead npc now

  • Fixed enchanting items

  • Adjusted some weapon and skill timers

  • Pheasants dont give xp anymore

  • Redid clan chat - TODO: Clan saving (after server restarts)

  • Cant tb npcs, fixed autocast for crumble undead (every modern and lunar spell now working 100%)

  • Npc’s walking home is clipped

  • Npcs and players who are frozen cannot be re-entangled

  • Added clan saving

  • Fixed gaining magic xp

  • Fixed lighting fire from ground event

  • Fixed retribution (multi and single zones work properly now)

  • Fixed server crash when player x-logs on death

  • Fixed unlimited runes with proper staff glitch

  • Major work on new resizable client, clan chat works properly now

  • Added lunar spell “spellbook swap”

  • Added lunar spell “dream”

  • Fixed up superheat spell

  • Added ability to cast another spell while autocasting

  • Every spell in all 3 magic books work properly now

  • Added minigame teleporter at home

  • Added barrows repair guy at barrow hills

  • Added slayer skill (Duradel located at home)

  • Adjusted thieving prices

  • Added minigame teleporter at home

  • Added barrows repair guy at barrow hills

  • Added slayer skill (Duradel located at home)

  • Adjusted thieving prices

  • Fixed items being glitched when dropped on heightlevel above 0

  • Slayer tower now fully functional

  • Picking food/objects now have lvl reqs (farming) and give farming xp

  • Added all the infinity rune staffs

  • Added lootshare for clans: Items over 5k is randomly decided between members in area, items over 100k get sold and split cash between members (10 squares)

  • Finished teleport tab

  • Fixed teleport timers

  • Fixed calculator when damaging a player with melee (to determine killer)

  • When trading or challenging a player, you will first run up to them and then send the request

  • Added an item check for every packet (to prevent even the minor dupes)

  • Fixed up lootshare (5k+ items get shared in a 20square radius), removed coinshare for now

  • Added player following npc (when npc walks)

  • Added men/women in Canifis that transform into werewolfs

  • Added a proper ladder system

  • Prayer altar in Lletya now boosts prayer by 2 and is the only altar that bones can be used on

  • Added foods to use on a baked potato in Lletya shop

  • Fixed buying items from shop

  • Added planting flowers

  • Custom objects now clipped (by coords atm)

  • Added proper attack animations for most weapons (missing spear emote)

  • Added restore potions and fixed super restores

  • Added height definiton for ground items

  • Fixed dharok’s greataxe interface

  • Fixed arrow checking while ranging

  • Deaths only add if a player kills you in multi

  • Added giant rats at home, increased hp of chicken

  • Changed rate of getting boss item drops

  • Fixed requirements for dragonhide armor

  • Added distance check for item on object packet

  • Added drops for random event npcs

  • Fixed capes equipping to correct slot

  • Fixed farming speed

  • Fixed Karil’s and Ahrim’s attacks

  • Changed barrows reward rate to 10%

  • Increased xp rate by 1.5x (Combat now 30x and Skills 8x)

  • Added fishing potions

  • Created a new method for npc attack and defense system

  • Replaced item prices/worth. If you find an item that is worth the wrong amount, pm me.

  • Added tutorial island

  • Added task level to slayer skill

  • Switched wilderness back to normal area

  • Added safe pk (Effects kdr)

  • Fixed slayer tasks for bandits and werewolves; added mummies

  • Increased npc respawn time

  • Fixed dc when attacking players sometimes

  • Castle wars now requires 3 ppl on each team to start a game

  • Added elf warriors at lletya

  • Added crafting gold bars into gold items (use on cut gems)

  • Fixed a couple packet bugs (following players/npcs doesnt glitch)

  • Fixed a bug that was causing server to crash (reload items)

  • Fixed cooking timer

  • Added a mass-clicking prevention system

  • Increased price of farm products (cabbage, potato, wheat, ect…)

  • Fixed 2 dupes

  • Decreased drop rate of boss key (Now at 3% and decreases)

  • Fixed item bonuses on gloves and Torag platebody

  • Fixed mithril smelting

  • Fixed enchanting items

  • Fixed the prayer abuse bug

  • Fixed castle wars stairs (unglitchable)

  • Fixed attack distance for players

  • Editted npc stats to combat * 50

  • Added mage bank lever and webs

  • Removed challange option while in a duel

  • Fixed walkable interfaces (wildy, duel, ect…)

  • Added spellbook change guy

  • Fixed spellbook swap spell + cast on lunar spells

  • Added ring of wealth effect (increased drop rate by 10%)

  • Fixed following during pvp

  • Added ancient staff drop to infernal mages

  • Fixed heal other and heal group spells

  • Adjusted npc stats once again

  • Added automatic double xp activator on weekends

  • Disabled skulling in safe pvp

  • Combat now resets when removing/equiping gear

  • Diagonal combat disabled

  • Disabling autocast now resets combat

  • Rewrote accuracy formula’s

  • Magic splashing works correctly now

  • Adjusted mage npcs combat

  • Fixed special attack formula

  • Added tzhaar cave npcs and shops

  • Added bolt tip making by using chisel on a cut gem

  • Added combining bolt tips with metal bolts

  • Fixed obby shield equipping to correct slot

  • Fixed ghostly robe (bottom) equipping to correct slot

  • Fixed thieving npc bug

  • Leveling up now resets your attack

  • Added mage arena minigame

  • Added god spells effects

  • Fixed change regions problem

  • Fixed map not loading bug when teleporting

  • Increased drop rates

  • Editted some npcs to have same drops as in rs

  • Your hit damage is now calculated on start of attack (prevents switching items for better bonus, ect…)

  • Fixed dbaxe, dspear, and rune throwaxe spec

  • Added d2h, seercull, daxe, darklight, and excalibur special attack (All spec weps now work)

  • Added proper range attack for Kalph Queen

  • Fixed gmaul spec delay

  • Protection prayers now quadruple your defence when fighting against npcs

  • Npc stats updated to be maxhit * 10

  • Fixed “make x” option for fletching, smithing, and cooking

  • Added new skilling system (1 settable event for all skills)

  • Changed protection prayers system to increase defence by 400 (against npc)

  • Added green dragons (by castle lvl 14 wildy) and king black dragon (original spot)

  • Fixed weapon interface update when switching weapons

  • Added facing npc when specing

  • Added different kinds of trees at home (Miscellenia)

  • Added skillcapes

  • Adjusted prayer drain rate to match rs

  • Fixed region system from crashing

  • Added dfs charge saving

  • Updated combat following to allow rangable objects

  • No more falling behind when attacking someone running

  • Prevented attacking with melee through fences/other rangable objects

  • Adjusted cooking rate

  • Added “buy skillcape” option to slayer master

  • Fixed requirements for correct bows/arrows and cbows/bolts

  • Npcs wander off if they can’t attack you after a certain amount of time

  • Tele random event will now switch your tabs to prevent botting

  • Fixed trading/stacking items (can’t stake/trade if not enough room)

  • Converted range data to string base

  • Added all range weps proper str, proj, gfx, ect…

  • Added Surgeon Tafani in duel arena (hitpoints cape)

  • Removed un-needed static initializers from Server class

  • Fixed npc walking and facing (saves correctly)

  • Fixed losing items when stacking on dc bug

  • Fixed incorrect hit delay on first attack

  • Fixed distance updating when out of range wep

  • Player hits are now handled on a cycle

  • Players no longer gain any xp when in a random event

  • Cleaned out more process from Client class

  • Updated ranged max hit formula

  • Updated melee weapons special bonus

  • Fixed stackable equipment going to right place when equipping 2-handed weapons

  • Fixed buying hp cape from surgeon tafani

  • Fixed staffs to give infinite runes properly

  • Fixed block animations for players and npcs

  • Fixed duel staking bug

  • Fixed crafting d’hide bug

  • Fixed slayer tasks bug

  • Fixed msb spec against npcs

  • Npcs will no longer start their attack anim if they are dead

  • Muted players can no longer use yell or shout

  • Set npc hits on a task cycle

  • Increased effects of protection prayers against npcs

  • Fixed challange option

  • Fixed the map glitch when teleporting while fighting an npc

  • Fixed npc multi attacks (normal speed rates now)

  • Set correct requirements for metal c’bows

  • Fixed smithing messages

  • Removed double xp weekend and set normal xp rates at double (Combat = 50x, Skilling = 15x)

  • Added anti-fire potion effects

  • Adjusted dragonfire to work same as rs

  • Added duration to fires based on log type

  • Fishing bait is only now used when you catch a fish

  • Random events added to skills (wc, fish, mine) individually

  • Npcs will no longer switch attack targets periodically (unless its a multi-attacker)

  • Fixed stun spell rune requirements

  • Adjusted some item prices (undead cow ribs, silk)

  • Fixed low and high alch spell rune requirements

  • Running away from random events now makes them disappear

  • Fixed typo in fletching (chaps and vambs switched around)

  • Added perfect formula for restoring/draining run energy

  • Fixed dfs charge saving correctly

  • Added anti-stuck method

  • Fixed clicking objects

  • Fixed crafting + added needle breaking

  • Added Grand Exchange

  • Noted and unnoted items go into same shop now

  • Fixed the blinking dialogue bug

  • Made tokkul unsellable/untradable

  • Changed intial skilling success rate from 20% to 30% (fishing, wcing, and mining)

  • Agility courses now give bonus xp when you complete the whole course

  • Converted runecraft to use enums, fixed multiplier bug

  • Fixed dragonfire breath (mage protect absorbs damage, antidragon shield more effective)

  • Fixed so Guthan only heals when he hits you

  • Fixed some null pointers and added an anti-crasher

  • Fixed GE bug that caused an item to be sold out when only 1 of it was purchased

  • Prevented alching unsellable items

  • PVP ORIENTATION UPDATE

  • Added Godwars

  • Ring of wealth now adds 2% chance to the total drop rate (so if drop rate is 1%, itll be 3%)

  • Added “enter amount” for using bones on altar

  • Fixed the “you are already logged in” bug

  • Protection prayers now give full immunity against npcs (npcs like verac still have their effect tho)

  • Double Everything event over, xp and drop rates restored to normal

  • Numerous bug fixes (if your bug still isnt fixed, post in bug section)

  • Added range attacks for Mutant tarn and Jungle demon

  • Fixed the disconnecting on death bug

  • Fixed some more gwd bugs

  • Fixed forcewalk glitching

  • Fixed following player bug

  • Fixed freezing players bug

  • Added barrow gloves to barrows rewards

  • Fixed combat clipping abit (checks if both players are clipped before attacking)

  • Fixed pvp autocasting

  • Fixed negetive defence glitching

  • Added prayer bonus to trimmed skillcapes

  • Fixed protect item prayer and added 1.5 sec delay when activating (same as rs)

  • Retribution is now set on the same timer as rs (not instantly after you die)

  • Added hardleather body crafting

  • Fixed smithing requirements

  • Added stud on leather making - Studs sold in alkharid craft shop

  • Added master farmer in lletya - sells team capes + farming cape

  • Added rune axe to wc shop

  • Fixed a shop bug

  • Made bandits thievable

  • Added poisoning npcs

  • Fixed hitmasks (poison will now always be green, fire will be orange)

  • Steelwill hits now count as magic

  • Fixed Karil’s c’bow speed

  • Grand Exchange bug fixed (the one where you couldn’t see ur items)

  • Updated red chinchompa’s and multi-spells (hits npcs and players now when in multi)

  • Freezing spells now take effect when the spell actually hits

  • Added goat horn dust in herblore shop (make combat pots)

  • Added working combat potion

  • Added weapon poison in potion shop, poison+ dropped by jungle spiders and poison scorps

  • Fixed normal and super potion forumla’s for increasing stats

  • Fixed normal chinchompa

  • Fixed freaky forester rewards

  • Made dspear 2-handed

  • Fixed running up to npcs when using long distance weapons

  • Set general store “refresh rate” to 5 minutes

  • Fixed using aid spells on players (you run up and then cast spell)

  • Can’t sell store items in GE for more than their store value

  • Added back losing items on death to any entity (player or npc)

  • Untradable items now go to your bank when you die (dont count as one of the items u keep)

  • Fixed dismantling godsword when less than 1 inven space

  • Fixed high alch and low alch prices

  • Fixed npcs from walking ontop of eachother

  • Added zammy spear spec

  • Fixed multiple bugs

  • Fixed 1-hit k0ing npcs drop

  • Can’t trade npcs thru walls

  • Can’t trade/challenge players thru walls

  • Can’t telegrab thru walls

  • Added ::yell command (Has bugs) (10/30/2011)
